attributes.action: Save the  BBC 6 Music Radio Station
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's rumoured that the BBC are planning to shut down their 6 Music digital radio station. We, the undersigned, value the high quality output that this station delivers and we want to see it remain part of the BBC network.

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government and so this is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
